Package com.doa.engine

Class DoaEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • com.doa.engine.DoaEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public final class DoaEngine
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Responsible for creating and supplying the graphics context used for drawing all created DoaObjects, and updating all created DoaObjects.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.0
    Version:
    "2.0"
    Author:
    Doga Oruc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • VERSION

        public static final java.lang.String VERSION
        Current version of DoaEngine.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TICK_RATE

        public static int TICK_RATE
        Number of updates per second. If DoaEngine is already running, stop() is advised to call before setting this value.

      • DEBUG_ENABLED

        public static boolean DEBUG_ENABLED
        Enable/Disable verbose debugging to console.

      • MULTI_THREAD_ENABLED

        public static boolean MULTI_THREAD_ENABLED
        EXPERIMENTAL

        Determines if DoaEngine should run on multiple cores. The amount of cores DoaEngine will utilise depends on the system configuration and the OS of the machine DoaEngine runs on.

      • RENDERING_MODE

        public static DoaRenderingMode RENDERING_MODE
        Rendering mode of DoaEngine. Default is DoaRenderingMode.BALANCED.
        See Also:
        DoaRenderingMode

      • USER_HINTS

        public static final java.util.Map<java.awt.RenderingHints.Key,​java.lang.Object> USER_HINTS
        User defined rendering hints. Initially, this map is empty. If none of the default rendering protocols suffice, any user can set the RENDERING_MODE to DoaRenderingMode.USER_DEFINED and add their own RenderingHints to this map. This way, the rendering will take place with the user defined Hints.
